pages.text: Cooking for Blockheads allows you to build multi-block kitchen structures that will allow you to easily see and craft all foods. A Kitchen multiblock is by no means necessary, but it's very convenient.

Sinks provide water to recipes (pipes can even draw infinite amounts of water from it!). Ovens cook food and can be upgraded to accept energy.$(br2)There are plenty of blocks to store your ingredients, like Cabinets and Fridges. $(br2)The Toaster and Tool Rack don't actually do anything, but the can still be crafted to make your kitchen look nice.
